TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Ciwcia, title = Ciwcia, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ciwcia} }

S.FORM: alang Ciwcia ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Ku'ang sang go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 159 buwan, 443 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 29% kyan ku 130 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 71% kyan ku 313 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Amis 14%, Tayan 2%, Paywan 1%, Bunun 9%, Truku 1%, binah lihuyan s'uli 2%. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Ciwcia hya' ga wsilung krahu'. tay 'zil na Ciwcia hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkyahu' na Ciwcia hya' ga Kano go. tay mkraya' na Ciwcia hya' ga Chishang. tay mkyahu' na Ciwcia hya' ga Cipurungan. tay 'llaw na Ciwcia hya' ga Parupu. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Ciwcia ga ungat kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Ciwcia ga ungat pqwasan biru. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Ciwcia ga niya mki sko Tayto Keng ato Ko'ang sang go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 159 bowan, 443 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 29% kyan ko 130 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 71% kyan ko 313 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Amis 14%, Tayan 2%, Paywan 1%, Bonon 9%, Troko 1%, binah lihoyan s'oli 2%. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Ciwcia hya' ga wsilong kraho'. tay 'zil na Ciwcia hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkyaho' na Ciwcia hya' ga Kano go. tay mkraya' na Ciwcia hya' ga Chishang. tay mkyaho' na Ciwcia hya' ga Ciporongan. tay 'llaw na Ciwcia hya' ga Paropo. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Ciwcia ga ongat kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Ciwcia ga ongat pqwasan biro. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
